Before finishing:

- Types: no `any` in prod code; no unexplained `ts-ignore`.
- A11y: labels, roles, keyboard, focus traps, color contrast unchanged.
- Duplication: repeated patterns extracted.
- Size: large components split where sensible.
- Tests: added/updated; suite passes.
- Lint/format/typecheck: pass.
- Docs/comments: add one-liners for non-obvious decisions.
- Do no create .md files summarizing our changes.
